entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, McCreary
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 a.m. CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.9Â°C

Humidity: 68 %

entry.title: Sunday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain near noon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending overnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023
